description:
Collect over 100 hypercars (and counting), and race with the most prestigious manufacturers, such as Ferrari, Porsche, and Lamborghini. Drift, boost and knock down your rivals in adrenaline-filled real-world locations. 

Steer your car via the console's versatile controls to drive like a pro racer, or choose the casual TouchDrive control scheme to focus on the fun. Race your way from anywhere in offline mode or play against up to three friends in the local multiplayer split-screen mode. Get online to play in single or up-to-8-player multiplayer races, join a Club, and enter Daily Events. 

Drive your way in handheld, TV, or tabletop mode and customize your cars, from upgrading their stats to changing the color of their brake calipers. You are in control.
name: Asphalt 9: Legends
